thread.title: Territory Kitchen & Bar Participating in 22nd Annual Serving Up Hope Luncheon this November
thread.title_full: Territory Kitchen & Bar Participating in 22nd Annual Serving Up Hope Luncheon this November

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Territory Kitchen & Bar Participating in 22nd Annual Serving Up Hope Luncheon this November
text:
Territory Kitchen & Bar is partnering with the Meetings Industry Council of Colorado to help benefit Food Bank of the Rockies at the 22nd Annual Serving Up Hope Luncheon. The luncheon, being held at Denver Mart Plaza Building on Tuesday, November 3rd, from 11:30 am to 1:30 pm, is a unique opportunity for attendees to network with industry peers and partners, while exploring creative food stations. Attendees will get to sample cuisine highlighting great restaurant and hotel chefs in Colorado, while supporting a great cause. Territory’s food station will be providing Tommy Knocker Root Beer Pork Loin with Apply Maple Chutney served with Sweet Potato Mashers and Wild Carrots to all attendees. Since all food stations are donated, 100% of proceeds go towards ending hunger by benefiting the Food Bank of the Rockies and its Denver’s Table program. Last year’s event donated over $24, 500 and over 26,000 pounds of non-perishable food to the food bank. Tickets to the event may be purchased individually or per group. Ticketing information may be found at http://www.regonline.com/builder/site/Default.aspx?EventID=1745554 . Territory Kitchen & Bar is Hilton Garden Inn’s on-site restaurant, open seven days a week for breakfast, lunch, happy hour and dinner. Territory offers creative Colorado cuisine in a rugged atmosphere, perfect for Colorado locals, business travelers and families looking to enjoy downtown Denver. Territory Kitchen & Bar is open Monday through Friday from 6 am to 10 pm and Saturday through Sunday from 7 am to 10 pm. Daily happy hour lasts from 3 pm to 6 pm and offers fantastic specials on house wine, draft beer, premium well cocktails and more. For more information or to make a reservation, please visit http://www.territorydenver.com or call (303) 603-8000.
Hilton Garden Inn Denver Downtown offers guests comfortable rooms, great amenities and the ideal location in the heart of downtown Denver. All guestrooms are newly renovated, with choice of king or queen rooms, suites and accessible rooms, available upon request. Hotel amenities include free Wi-Fi, on-site fitness center and pool, over 6,000 sq. ft. of meeting space, Dazbog Coffee® Shop and Territory Kitchen & Bar. For more information or to make reservations, please visit http://www.hgidenverdowntown.com or call (303) 603-8000. The Hilton Garden Inn Denver Downtown is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, CO.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver, Colorado. This diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit our website at http://www.sbcos.com .
